body_html: But having zero-filled gradient will create unnecessary computations, no? What about just making a copy of the variable we don't want to backpropagate through, so that it becomes a leaf that does not require gradient? If we do this for var2 in the example, then var1 won't receive gradients, although it will be flagged as requires_grad = True, but I guess this is fine, isn't it?
